intent_atoms.description: Blocked tasks must be updated whenever blockers change to maintain day‑to‑day visibility.
Import licensed real‑world assets and refresh regression baselines so tolerant parsing and export scenarios can validate against real‑world payloads once licensing approvals are obtained.
Licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG‑H fixtures must be granted before importing licensed assets.
Execute the macOS 1 GiB lenient‑vs‑strict benchmark once macOS hardware with the 1 GiB performance fixture becomes available.
macOS hardware with the 1 GiB performance fixture must be available in the automation environment before running the benchmark.
Publish performance baselines for FoundationUI Phase 5.2 after manual profiling and benchmarking tasks are completed.
All manual profiling steps (render time <100 ms, memory allocation <5 MB, 60 FPS on device) must be documented in a performance report before publishing baselines.

All benchmark metrics (build time <10s, binary size <500KB, memory footprint <5MB per screen, 60 FPS during interactions, BoxTreePattern with 1000+ nodes) must be recorded and documented before CI integration with performance gates.
Cross‑platform test results (iOS 17+, macOS 14+, iPadOS 17+ devices, dark mode, RTL, locale/region) must be compiled into a cross‑platform report before the next step.
Accessibility testing must achieve 98% score via automated tests and manual edge‑case validation before final accessibility sign‑off.

functional_units.name: Import Licensed Assets and Refresh Baselines
functional_units.description: Imports licensed media assets (Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, MPEG‑H) into the system and refreshes regression baselines to validate tolerant parsing and export scenarios against real-world payloads.

functional_units.name: Execute macOS 1 GiB Benchmark
functional_units.description: Runs a lenient‑vs‑strict performance benchmark on macOS using a 1 GiB payload, collects runtime and RSS metrics, and archives the results in Documentation/Performance.

functional_units.name: Publish Performance Baselines
functional_units.description: Publishes collected performance baseline data (e.g., render times, memory usage, FPS) into PERFORMANCE.md after profiling with Xcode Instruments.

functional_units.name: CI Integration with Performance Gates
functional_units.description: Integrates manual benchmark results into continuous‑integration pipelines to enforce performance thresholds for build time, binary size, memory footprint, FPS, and large‑node layout tests.

functional_units.name: Compile Cross‑Platform Test Report
functional_units.description: Aggregates test outcomes from iOS, macOS, and iPadOS devices/simulators (including dark mode, RTL, locale) into a comprehensive cross‑platform compatibility report.

functional_units.name: Final Accessibility Sign‑Off
functional_units.description: Completes manual accessibility validation (VoiceOver, keyboard navigation, dynamic type, contrast, etc.) and signs off the product for accessibility compliance.
